reqs: Pre-reqs: Either (a) VISA 250 or (b) one of VISA 283, VISA 284, VISA 290, FINA 283, FINA 284, FINA 290.
courseName: Intermediate Print Media II: Interdisciplinary Approaches to Image Production
description: Screen printing and other print applications in combination with digital and photographic technologies, and drawing, explored within the context of contemporary art.
